description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The ultimate party game!  Gather up to 15 of your friends for non-stop competative arcade action!   Furball combines the fun of a great 2D shooter with an innovative 4-players-per-controller style you've never seen before.  Features include computer players, lots of powerups, and full customizability.
description.short: The ultimate party game!  Gather up to 15 of your friends for non-stop competative arcade action!   Furball combines the fun of a great 2D shooter with an innovative 4-players-per-controller style you've never seen before.  Features include computer players, lots of powerups, and full customizability.
